Description: Omphalos of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery phiale mesomphalos; white slip; interior: glazed black (very worn); trace of large rosette in added white on top of omphalos surrounded by white bands; exterior reserved save of square and billet pattern band around the omphalos.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Bryn Mawr, the Art and Artifact Collections. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.2222) (phase 2)
